ca.ualberta.taskr

Class MyTasksActivity

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.MyTasksActivity

  • public class MyTasksActivity

    Displays a list of all tasks owned by the current user and a button for creating new tasks. Tasks can be clicked to launch class ViewTaskActivity for that task.

    See Also:
    class ViewTaskActivity

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

        Initializes all views including toolbar and RecyclerView for task list. Sets listener for task list that starts class ViewTaskActivity for the clicked task and sets the refresh listener to repopulate the task list on refresh.

        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState -
        See Also:
        class ViewTaskActivity, class TaskListAdapter

      • openEditTaskActivity
